fields.value: Big Data Visualization: A Game changer in GIS, Geo-analysis and Geo-demographics

dsDescriptionValue.value: Today, everybody around the world is living and working under the coverage of Geographic Information system (GIS) application and services such as the Google Earth, GPS and much more. Big Data visualization tools are increasingly creating a wonder in the world of GIS. GIS has diverse application, from geo-positioning services to 3D demonstrations and virtual reality. Big Data and its tools of visualization has boosted the field of GIS. This article seeks to explore how Big data visualization has expanded the field of Geo- spatial analysis with the intention to present practicable GIS-based tools required to stay ahead in this field.

keywordValue.value: Data visualization, Big Data, geopositioning, Geographical Information System, Geo analysis, Geodemography

publicationCitation.value: Junghoon Ki (November 27th 2018). GIS and Big Data Visualization [Online First], IntechOpen, DOI: 10.5772/intechopen.82052. Available from: https://www.intechopen.com/online-first/gis-and-big-data-visualization
